task.name: hifa_tsysflag
task.shortdescription: Flag deviant system temperatures for ALMA interferometry measurements. This is done by running a sequence of flagging subtasks, each looking for a different type of possible error.
task.description:
Flag deviant system temperatures for ALMA interferometry measurements.
Flag all deviant system temperature measurements in the system temperature calibration table by running a sequence of flagging tests, each designed to look for a different type of error.
If a file with manual Tsys flags is provided with the 'filetemplate' parameter, then these flags are applied prior to the evaluation of the flagging heuristics listed below.
The tests are:
1. Flag Tsys spectra with high median values
2. Flag Tsys spectra with high median derivatives. This is meant to spot spectra that are 'ringing'.
3. Flag the edge channels of the Tsys spectra in each SpW.
4. Flag Tsys spectra whose shape is different from that associated with the BANDPASS intent.
5. Flag 'birdies'.
6. Flag the Tsys spectra of all antennas in a timestamp and spw if proportion of antennas already flagged in this timestamp and spw exceeds a threshold, and flag Tsys spectra for all antennas and all timestamps in a spw, if proportion of antennas that are already entirely flagged in all timestamps exceeds a threshold.
Output
results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.

param.description: Evaluate the nmedian metric separately for each field.

param.name: flag_derivative

param.description: True to flag Tsys spectra with high median derivative.

param.name: fd_max_limit
param.shortdescription: Flag spectra with median derivative higher than fd_max_limit * median of this measure over all spectra
param.description: Flag spectra with median derivative higher than fd_max_limit * median of this measure over all spectra.

param.name: flag_edgechans
param.shortdescription: True to flag edges of Tsys spectra
param.description: True to flag edges of Tsys spectra.

param.name: fe_edge_limit
param.shortdescription: Flag channels whose channel to channel difference greater than fe_edge_limit * median across spectrum
param.description: Flag channels whose channel to channel difference > fe_edge_limit * median across spectrum.

param.name: flag_fieldshape
param.shortdescription: True to flag Tsys spectra with a radically different shape to those of the ff_refintent
param.description: True to flag Tsys spectra with a radically different shape to those of the ff_refintent.

param.name: ff_refintent
param.shortdescription: Data intent providing the reference shape for \'flag_fieldshape\'
param.description: Data intent that provides the reference shape for 'flag_fieldshape'.

param.name: ff_max_limit
param.shortdescription: Flag Tsys spectra with \'fieldshape\' metric greater than ff_max_limit
param.description: Flag Tsys spectra with 'fieldshape' metric values > ff_max_limit.

param.name: flag_birdies

param.description: True to flag channels covering sharp spectral features.

param.name: fb_sharps_limit
param.shortdescription: Flag channels bracketing a channel to channel difference greater than fb_sharps_limit
param.description: Flag channels bracketing a channel to channel difference > fb_sharps_limit.

param.name: flag_toomany
param.shortdescription: True to flag Tsys spectra for which a proportion of timestamps or proportion of antennas that are entirely flagged exceeds their respective thresholds.
param.description: True to flag Tsys spectra for which a proportion of antennas for given timestamp and/or proportion of antennas that are entirely flagged in all timestamps exceeds their respective thresholds.

param.name: tmf1_limit
param.shortdescription: Flag all Tsys spectra within a timestamp for an antenna if proportion flagged already exceeds tmf1_limit
param.description: Flag Tsys spectra for all antennas in a timestamp and spw if proportion of antennas already flagged in this timestamp and spw exceeds tmf1_limit.

param.name: tmef1_limit
param.shortdescription: Flag all Tsys spectra for all antennas in a spw, if proportion of antennas that are already entirely flagged in all timestamps exceeds tmef1_limit
param.description: Flag Tsys spectra for all antennas and all timestamps in a spw, if proportion of antennas that are already entirely flagged in all timestamps exceeds tmef1_limit.

param.name: metric_order
param.shortdescription: Order in which to evaluate the flagging metric(s); inactive metrics are skipped.
param.description: Order in which to evaluate the flagging metrics that are enables. Disabled metrics are skipped.

param.name: normalize_tsys
param.shortdescription: Normalize Tsys prior to computing the flagging metric(s)
param.description: True to create a normalized Tsys table that is used to evaluate the Tsys flagging metrics. All newly found flags are also applied to the original Tsys caltable that continues to be used for subsequent calibration.

param.name: filetemplate
param.shortdescription: File containing manual Tsys flags to apply.
param.description: The name of a text file that contains the manual Tsys flagging template. If the template flags file is undefined, a name of the form 'msname.flagtsystemplate.txt' is assumed.

param.name: pipelinemode
param.shortdescription: The pipeline operations mode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In interactive mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or list commands (True)
param.description: Run the commands (True) or generate the commands to be run but do not execute (False).

param.name: acceptresults
param.shortdescription: Automatically apply results to context
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or reject them (False).

task.example:
1. Flag Tsys measurements using currently recommended tests:
hifa_tsysflag()
2. Flag Tsys measurements using all recommended tests apart from that using the 'fieldshape' metric:
hifa_tsysflag(flag_fieldshape=False)
